source_objects.title: Sales
source_objects.description: Improve your sales skills with courses on sales promotion, mastering sales calls, mastering sales meetings, sales persuasion skills, cold calling skills, closing sales and more.

items.title: The Complete Sales Prospecting Bootcamp Course
items.headline: Learn how to schedule meetings with top executives by crafting great cold emails, phone calling, LinkedIn and more!
objectives_summary: Identify your buyer and how to find them
Find people's contact info
Craft amazing cold emails with compelling messaging

items.title: Sales Skills Mastery 1:  Sales Training For Beginners
items.headline: Selling Techniques and Sales Strategy that Every Salesperson Ought to Know - Sales Training For the Modern World
objectives_summary: CREATE Optimal Mindset For Sales Success so that you stop making unconscious mistakes and more naturally do things that lead to more sales
UNCOVER What Your Prospects Actually WANT to Buy so that selling becomes easier and more enjoyable
DISCOVER Your Ideal and Most Profitable next Clients so that you waste less time pitching the wrong people

items.title: B2B Sales - Close More Deals, Get More Leads, Work Less

visible_instructors.job_title: Founder SalesSchema, Bestselling Author, 1st Empl IdeaRocket

items.headline: Drastically improve lead generation with apps, tools, and outsourcing.  Close more deals by using an effective script.
objectives_summary: Drastically Increase Your Value Within a Short Period of Time
Close More B2B Lead Opportunities
Successfully Outsource B2B Sales Leads Generation

items.title: Business to Business Selling Skills
items.headline: B2B Selling Skills will have IMMEDIATE IMPACT on the success of Face-to-Face Salespeople who sell a considered purchase.
objectives_summary: Easily identify why your customer is going to buy.
Confidently approach ANY sales presentation knowing you have the skills to get the best outcome for all parties.
Professionally deal with decision makers from purchasing right up to the CEO

objectives_summary: Generate Leads & Sales from Linkedin
Get Blog Traffic From Linkedin
Optimise Your Linkedin Profile

items.title: Fundamentals of Real Customer Success

visible_instructors.title: Lincoln Murphy
visible_instructors.name: Lincoln
visible_instructors.job_title: Customer-centric Growth Expert, Consultant, & Thought Leader

items.headline: Ensure your customers stay longer, buy more, and advocate for you by helping them achieve their desired outcome.
objectives_summary: Discover why customer success matters for you, your company, and your customers
Define what customer success is and isn't
Explore the components of a desired outcome and how to figure out your customers' desired outcomes

items.title: CRUSH IT !!! – Sales Strategies
items.headline: Discover a step by step sales process you can drop into your business to re-connect with lost prospects. Close Sales Now
objectives_summary: Discover a step by step process you can drop into your business to re-connect with lost prospects.  The individuals who will make the most money are those who have the ability to leverage the conversations they've already had.

items.title: Sales Fire: B2B Sales & Business Development for Startups
items.headline: The Ultimate Sales Methodology for Business Development & B2B Sales to Learn Sales Strategy, Sales Skills & Deal Closing
objectives_summary: Students will master the step-by-step Sales Fire Methodology to consistently close deals with anyone
Students will learn how to build their own "Sales Map" and develop their own sales and business development strategy to scale their business
How to understand the psychology of why people buy and how to influence others emotionally

items.headline: Discover 20 easy to implement strategies to reduce your churn rate in less than 3 months and increase your retention
objectives_summary: You will be able to increase your retention rate
You will reduce your churn rate
Increase your annual recurrent revenue

items.title: Print on Demand with Etsy for Passive Income 2021 Guide

How much can you really make from print-on-demand and dropshipping
How to start a fully automated eCommerce business

items.title: Advanced Copywriting Strategies for Online Sales
items.headline: The step-by-step system for turning online leads into buyers with advanced copywriting techniques
objectives_summary: Improve conversion rate of online product sales
Write copy that builds trust and engages customers

items.title: Small Business Lead Generation
items.headline: Learn how to get meeting with restaurants, spas, doctors and other small businesses using proven Cold Email tactics.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you'll learn exactly how to connect with new clients using cold emails to grow your business
You'll learn a system you can use on a regular basis to constantly drum up new business

items.title: Professional Sales Training - Compelling Conversations
items.headline: Sky rocket your sales performance through persuasive sales messages and compelling sales conversations.
objectives_summary: Apply practical techniques from the course and start seeing significant results in your sales efforts.

items.title: Cold Calling: A New Approach

visible_instructors.title: Andy Horner
visible_instructors.name: Andy
visible_instructors.job_title: CEO at Ace of Sales and Self Marketing Hero

items.headline: Cold calling leads to failure, fatigue, and more failure - it's time to adopt a new strategy. Start with this course.
objectives_summary: Know the difference between the "old" cold call, and why it doesn't work, and the "new" cold call, and how it can work for you.

items.title: Supercharged Prospecting

visible_instructors.title: Warren Greshes
visible_instructors.name: Warren
visible_instructors.job_title: Internationally known speaker/author on sales and motivation

items.headline: Sell More Appointments and Get in Front of More Hot Prospects to Increase Your Sales & Achieve Financial Independence.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to control the phone conversation while anticipating and turning around objections better than ever.
I will outline for you, word for word, a short to-the-point, easy-to-implement, telephone script guaranteed to increase your odds of selling the appointment and getting in the door.
You will walk away with a simple, easy-to-use call counting system that allows you to know your success ratios for every part of the sales process.

items.title: B2B Sales Skills: Handle the Objection
items.headline: B2B objections handling masterclass: B2B sales skills to handle any objection (Sales Skills Academy Program)
objectives_summary: Handling objections confidently
Knowling what to say
Knowing how to say it (tonality)
